website_summaries.verdict: A premium ionic hair dryer that is on par with salon dryers for a better styling experience.
pros: Dryer barrel infused with 24-karat gold to evenly distribute heat
Strong, durable build will hold up when traveling
Quiet operation, even when using higher speeds and settings
cons: Control buttons on the handle are easy to press by mistake

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 1 month
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer started out great! It dried my hair so fast for the first few weeks. Before I had even had it 1 month the heating element broke and it now only blows cold air, doubling the time it takes to dry my hair. For the price, I expected much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: AN2417

customer_reviews.title: Took some getting used to but now I am fine with it
customer_reviews.text: Salon quality but a little too big and very heavy, for my tastes. Took some getting used to but now I am fine with it. The additions don't screw on though, so you really have to jam them on top for them to stay.
customer_reviews.author: Blut Engel

customer_reviews.title: It was used
customer_reviews.text: Check out the photos. The box it came in was dirty and looked like it had been on a shelf for 5 years. The box itself was not sealed and inside was equally as dirty. There were scratches all over it. Obviously this thing was used and on top of that $135. Don't buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Carmela

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this dryer, except I wish it got a bit hotter. The noise level is great - really quiet. The weight is perfect, and the dryer is easy to handle. The cord is long. The switches are easy to use. It's a very high quality hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy... no hot air. But a great company
customer_reviews.text: I love this company but this dryer was very heavy and the air didn’t blow hot enough. Seller has Excellent customer service as they allowed me to exchange with no hassle. I love the bio ionic travel pro. It’s so light and easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: TracyAZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer was worth the extra money. I have no complaints with it! It helps quickly dry my hair, and is quite powerful. It makes minimal noise (for a hair dryer), and has an extra long cord. It has multiple heat settings, so you don't have to overblast your hair with too much heat if you do not want to. I have had it for several months now and am still pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: I love my old Bio-Ionic, but I find they don't last more than 3-4 years. I couldn't find the same model, so I bought this one -- not great. The force of the air is much stronger than the last one and makes it more difficult to blow hair out smoothly because all the pieces are blowing like crazy. Having the buttons on the side of the handle is a poor design. It's hard to hold the handle without hitting the buttons. Pretty meh. For the price? No way.
customer_reviews.author: Just Passin Through

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic blow drier!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blowdrier! It's powerful and dries my hair quickly, and I love that it has 3 different heat settings. I love the diffuser attachment for making my hair smooth and keeping the frizzies down. This blow drier will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: I like to eat pie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great hairdryer. I’ve only ever bought cheap one and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hairdryer. I’ve only ever bought cheap one and the difference in quality and performance is striking. I’m sure this one will last me probably forever. Glad I got it. The shipping and service were great also, so I would give that 5 stars, too.
customer_reviews.author: M. George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awsome dryer. Very gentle but effective for not damaging my hair.
customer_reviews.author: moonstruck

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, not sure it's worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hairdryer because I found it on a website claiming to reduce frizz for people with curly hair... However, I do not feel that this hairdryer works any better than cheap hairdryer on the market. Also, I agree with previous reviews that it doesn't get super hot (however, this might be better for your hair?!). Afterwards I bought the BIO IONIC defuser and seems to help cut down the frizz a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Lani Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great until it dies
customer_reviews.text: Loved it - super powerful and fast, even on medium settings. Unfortunately, it didn’t even last 2 years. Died on me and smoked dangerously too. Really scary. I’ve had cheap dryers from Revlon that lasted 3x as long
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my daughter she absolutely loved it - not even playing the same game as the CVS ones. She says it drys her hair three times as fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Does not blow out extremely hot hair if ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Does not blow out extremely hot hair if that’s what your looking for. Hair feels soft & looks shiny after use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 drop.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great hair dryer but not durable. It dries my hair very quickly, but I only used it once and then barely dropped it. Something plastic in the hair dryer broke and then melted to front grill.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my salon
customer_reviews.text: I was having problems with dryness in my hair and my salon recommended this hair dryer. It is the best hair dryer I have ever used. It dries my hair quickly but I am not having problems with my hair becoming too dry and brittle. I highly recommend this hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri Criqui

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer! My hair drys very fast with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer! My hair drys very fast with this dryer. It also leaves my hair with a shine. I would recommend this dryer. I really could not say anything negative
customer_reviews.author: garbo

customer_reviews.title: Not Hot
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this blowdryer, but I felt it did not get hot. I have thick hair but it is very short (pixie undercut short) and i felt like i had to put it on highest setting to get any heat which made my hair feel like straw once dry. Was lightweight and I liked that the front concentrator snapped on.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Does not get hot
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use it several times but it does not get as hot as my cheaper hair dryer. I have thick hair and it took longer to dry my hair using this hairdryer. As one of the most expensive dryers in the market it didn't work as I would have liked it to, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: 14cures

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent hairdryer. It’s exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent hairdryer. It’s exactly as described. It is a little on the loud side, I thought it might be quieter but I love it all the same
customer_reviews.author: mossbarger22

customer_reviews.title: I want to love this...
customer_reviews.text: Bio Ionic has always been my favorite dryer. This model tends to be very low on heat, which isn't necessarily a bad thing, but there are times when I want my hair to dry quicker and I feel like if there was an option to have more heat than this would be the perfect dryer. That being said, I love the air flow and the lightweight design. My naturally curly hair really does well with this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Jaci Clawson

customer_reviews.title: Love this Blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my purchase. Great Blow dryer and middle price range.
customer_reviews.author: Eileenmarie

customer_reviews.title: I personally love the power behind this dryer
customer_reviews.text: I personally love the power behind this dryer, my hair does get dryer fast then all my previous blow dryers and it doesn't tangle or suck up my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tigersicord

customer_reviews.title: Love the quietness!
customer_reviews.text: More quiet than most. Dries hair quickly. Comes with 2 attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Harger

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like this dryer. Especially the diffuser that came with it. And it’s powerful to dry hair quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jbd

customer_reviews.title: Died after 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: Died after 1.5 years of use, too expensive for that period of life. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadya

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not meet my expectation. Did not get hot enough
customer_reviews.author: Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: I don't love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: I don't love this dryer. I don't find that it dries my hair faster and that's a real issue for me. I've wondered if something is wrong with it. I was going to return it this past fall but was past the return date. The controls are also in a terrible spot and I was always changing them while I was drying. Definitely disappointed after the $$$ I spent on it. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MT2005

customer_reviews.title: Great blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Love it. A salon product. Will dry hair quickly and quietly
customer_reviews.author: norma

customer_reviews.title: Would like to return for refund or get a replacement
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks after return window hair dryer stopped Working. Would like to return for refund or get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Vela

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Work great fast drying and leaves hair soft and shiny
customer_reviews.author: Errica Coon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: The plug constantly falls out of the outlet and the screen on the back of the dryer frequently comes off. Would have returned it if I didn't throw the box away.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi E Peck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the power, weight and results. My hair LOOKS better.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Highly recommend!! Powerful safe temperature. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had this 4 months and it died. Don’t waste your $$ on this! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jyll

customer_reviews.title: Loving the smoothness in my frizzy hair.
customer_reviews.text: Works very fast and leaves my hair smooth. The temperature settings are perfect. The cord is nice and long.
customer_reviews.author: marge lawler

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: This hairdryer is horrible. It fries ur hair. I returned it after the first use
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Best hair dryer ever
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this hair dryer!!! Amazing and fast and perfect! It is on the heavy side but I don't mind that!
customer_reviews.author: Erika W Goffinet

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucked and barely blew any hot air. I used once and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Air

customer_reviews.title: best ever hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Very best hair dryer I have EVER had! Quieter too, easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: wasp54

customer_reviews.title: Love how it cuts drying time in half and smoother ...
customer_reviews.text: Love how it cuts drying time in half and smoother blowout. If you are reading this review then note that I need a return label for a pair of earrings that came in the wrong color. Third request for a return label
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Krater

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is great dryer heats up really well Thank you so
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a while ago and just opened it this week. The writing on side is faded and I am wondering if this was indeed new or refurbished dryer that was sent to us. Can you please check order? Otherwise it is great dryer heats up really well Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Olympia Pappas

product_meta.title: BIO IONIC Goldpro Dryer
product_meta.description:
24k gold ceramic mineral complex is infused into the bio ionic goldpro styling collection. The 24k gold ensures constant, even heat distribution while the ceramic mineral complex infuses moisture deep into the hair giving it a healthy, superior shine. 1875 Watts ; Cord Length : 9 ft

BRAND STORY
Founded by a hair stylist, Bio Ionic is the Professional’s choice for styling tools. Advanced natural ionic technology delivers speed and healthy, hydrated hair.
